creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: inscriptions on fans made of decorated gold and silver paper against fabric; organically shaped patches of green, brown, striped, and red multicolored silk
inscription:
Signature, Inscriptions, and Seals

top fan: [If Heaven and Earth should cease to be, / we would stop meeting. / However, this will never happen.] ; second fan: [halfway drunk] ; third fan: [when I sing, the moon drifts. / When I dance, my shadow wavers.] ; fourth fan: [peacefulness]
title: Folding Fans with Calligraphy
